full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL RTA MGRIN YANG GSANG GI NYAMS LEN ZAB GNAD KYI SMON LAM BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (CES PADMA DBANG CHEN RGYUD KYI DGONGS PA BZHIN DU DPAL RTA MGRIN GYI LAM NYES LEN GYI RIM PA ZAB GNAD THAMS CAD MA TSANG BA MED PAR BSDUS NAS SMON @005A *, , RIM PA BYA TSUL 'DI YANG, MDO SDE STOD SGOM SA NA RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA RIN CHEN 'OD ZER GYIS BSKUL TE PADMA DBANG CHEN GYI RNAL 'BYOR PA DPAL 'BYOR LHUN GRUB KIS SER BYES BLA BRANG DU SBYAR BA 'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,THUB BSTAN RIN CHEN DAR ZING RGYAS PA DANG, ,'GRO KUN BDE SKYID DPAL LA SBYOR BA'I PHYIR, ,BSOD NAMS KUN BSDUD GLING GI BLA BRANG NAS, ,CHOS SBYIN 'DZAD MED GANGG'A'I RGYUN 'DI SPEL, ,LEGS SO, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
